# ManipulationComponent.InputDevice.Kind

**Enumeration**

Describes the kind of an input device.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Kind
```

## Structures

- **ManipulationComponent.InputDevice.Kind.Set**: An efficient set of input device kinds.

## Enumeration Cases

- **ManipulationComponent.InputDevice.Kind.directPinch**: A pinching hand in close proximity to content.
- **ManipulationComponent.InputDevice.Kind.indirectPinch**: An indirectly targeted pinching hand.
- **ManipulationComponent.InputDevice.Kind.pointer**: A click-based, indirect input device.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
